description: Police say 30 people were injured after a car was driven into a crowd in the town of Volkmarsen.
title: Car drives into carnival crowd in German town Volkmarsen
title_page: Car drives into carnival crowd in German town Volkmarsen - BBC News
maintext: The incident took place during celebrations for Rosenmontag, or Rose Monday - a carnival day celebrated in some parts of Germany, Austria, Belgium and Switzerland. Schools are often closed for the day, although it is not a national holiday in Germany.
